wikipedia_page.main: Percy Eccles was a professional rugby league and association footballer who played in the 1900s. He played at representative level for Great Britain and England, and at club level for Halifax (Heritage № 147), as a wing, i.e. number 2 or 5.He played association football for Bradford F.C. in 1908 before returning to his "first love" of rugby in 1909.

link_mentions.page: List of Great Britain national rugby league team players

response: * Percy Eccles won caps for England while at Halifax 1908 New Zealand, and won caps for Great Britain while at Halifax 1908 New Zealand
